  • Constructor Details

    • Channel

      public Channel​(String name, String nit, String website)
      Constructor method that creates an instance of subscriber class
      Parameters:
      name - , String, it is the name of the channel (its default value is "BlackSnail")
      nit - , String, it is the tax identification number of the channel (For example: 123456789)
      website - , String, it is the website address of the channel (For example: www.blacksnail.com)

    • verifyExistenceOfAtLeastOneSubscriber

      public boolean verifyExistenceOfAtLeastOneSubscriber()
      Verifies the existence of at least one registered subscriber
      Returns:
      out, boolean, it is true if exists at least one registered subscriber, false otherwise

    • verifyRepeatedCard

      public boolean verifyRepeatedCard​(String identificationCard)
      Verifies the existence of a repeated identification card
      Parameters:
      identificationCard - , String, Potential identification card for a new subscriber
      Returns:
      out, booolean, it is true if exists a match to the identification card entered as parameter, false otherwise

    • addSubscriber

      public boolean addSubscriber​(String name, String identificationCard, int age, int hours, int type)
      Creates instances of the class subscriber into the first empty position of the list of subscribers, and returns a boolean false if there are not empty positions
      Parameters:
      identificationCard - , String, it is the identification of the subscriber (For example: 1006171667)
      name - , String, it is the full name of the subscriber (For example: Gabriel Restrepo)
      age - , int, it is the age of the subscriber (For example: 18)
      hours - , int, it is the amount of hours the subscriber is diposed to spend to consume audiovisual content (For example: 8)
      type - , int, is the number that corresponds to one type of client of the subscriber, it can be 1 (NORMAL), 2 (PLATINUM),3 (GOLD) or 4 (DIAMOND) (For example: 1(NORMAL))
      Returns:
      flag, boolean, true if the subscriber was added successfully, false if there are not empty positions to add the new subscriber

    • identificationCardMatch

      public int identificationCardMatch​(String identificationCard)
      Returns the index of the subscriber that matches with the ID entered as parameter
      Returns:
      matchFound, int, index of the subscriber that matches with the ID entered as parameter, the value will be -1 otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Creates a string with the information of the channel
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      channel, String, string with the information of the channel For example: ***Information of the Channel*** Name: BlackSnail WebSite: www.blacksnail.com Subscribers: 12 NORMAL: 3 PLATINUM: 3 GOLD: 3 DIAMOND: 3
